forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Setting Things via Webpage, and working Camera Filters

comments.text: Hi everyone! Here's what's new in version 159.7 (you're on [version])! Hope you enjoy!
Webpages can now use AnylandGetThing(json) and AnylandSetThing(json) to read/ write/ change the edited object!
... More at anyland.com/info/webpage-commands.html ... which now also contains test buttons.
custom browser functions now also work when the URL was manually set (not just when using the "show web" command)!
Area filters like bloom or saturation now also show on custom cameras! Note enabling "Extra effects in VR" is needed for bloom & edge shade. Thx Ferny!
"Crying voices" appeared twice in the loop auto-completion, that's fixed now! Thx Ferny!
Update 159.8: There was an error with camera stream position/ rotation in this update, please grab this update to fix that!
Update 159.9: We fixed an issue with the AnylandGetThing! (We're still investigating a bug with functions deregistering when you hit Reload on a browser page.)
... Also, a sample button, "Color & Shrink Spheres", has been added to anyland.com/info/webpage-commands.html
Update 159.10: Webpage functions like AnylandTell now also work if you hit Reload on the browser dialog!
maybe make it so you can embed links in the boards

thread.latestCommentText: maybe make it so you can embed links in the boards
